meanings.definition: A person who is in charge of managing a fleet of trucks.
meanings.sent1: The truckmasters ensured all the vehicles were properly maintained.
meanings.sent2: The truckmasters at the company were responsible for scheduling deliveries.
meanings.sent3: The truckmasters organized a race for the trucks, but they all got stuck in traffic!
meanings.sent4: The truckmasters steered the fleet through the busy city streets with precision.
meanings.sent5: The truckmasters' expertise in logistics kept the operation running smoothly.

meanings.definition: The company or organization that specializes in the operation and management of trucks.
meanings.sent1: Our company hired the truckmasters to handle our transportation needs.
meanings.sent2: The truckmasters provided efficient services for transporting goods across the country.
meanings.sent3: The truckmasters hosted a truck-themed party for their employees.
meanings.sent4: The truckmasters navigated the challenges of the industry with skill and expertise.
meanings.sent5: The truckmasters' dedication to quality service set them apart from their competitors.
